Summary: 2 loud booms , followed by very very loud jets of some kind.
divs: Sighting Details It was St. Patricks Day ..My Boyfriend and I had been napping on the couch in our living room enjoying our day off ..when we woke to the sound of a pretty loud (sonic)boom, it really really startled us, Then before I could even think or speak an Even Louder Boom, But the loudest I have ever heard in a really long time...it sounded like a bomb right outside my house, I was telling my boyfriend how that was quite startling,and that sent all of our cats scurrying about the house. and then we heard sound of a very loud aircraft, Im assuming Jets of some sort I didnt go out and look. I just wanted to Report the Loud sonic booms,Why would an aircraft need to go that fast? over a small town... were they chasing something?
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Logansport
There were 2 other sightings in Logansport on or around March 17th 2010
